issue.title: [CF 55] Localization files aren't encoded using UTF-8
issue.body:
In the directory Localization, files TellMeWhen-deDE.lua, TellMeWhen-frFR.lua, TellMeWhen-esES.lua and TellMeWhen-esMX.lua are encoded with ISO-8859-1 instead of UTF-8.


> Posted by CurseForge user Avold | Imported from CurseForge issue #55 | Raw

comments.body:
whoops. The Korean, Chinese, and Russian ones were because they have to be, but I forgot to make the others UTF-8 too


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
